Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Lipps
ShortDescription: Westbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Sheridan
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
